turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. How's it going?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: it's going great. how are you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm great. I'd like to order three medium pizzas from Belluno, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great to hear. sure, let's do it. what did you want on those 3 medium pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to know does does bone have good cheese?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes, bella luna has goat cheese.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, I'd like to have goat cheese, cheddar cheese, arty chips, and bacon.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want those toppings on all 3 pizzas?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, and what did you want for the other two?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Does Bella Luna have shrimp?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: no, unfortunately they do not have shrimp.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right, I will All right, I would like to have on on this pizza I would like extra mushrooms, cheddar cheese.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: extra bacon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And barbecue sauce, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. and what did you want on the third?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to have.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do they have a Mexican-style pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: no, unfortunately they do not.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: K, one moment.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What does the vegetarian pizza What does the veggie lover's pizza have on it?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: veggie lovers has green peppers, mushrooms, olives, and sun dried tomatoes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, I will I will do that and I'll take extra cheese and all of the pizzas, please. And I'll add oreo chocs to the veggie lovers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: let me make sure i got the order down correctly before submitting. 3 medium pizzas, 1 with goat cheese, feta cheese, artichokes and bacon, 1 with extra mushrooms, cheddar cheese, extra bacon, and bbq sauce. and 1 veggie lovers and add artichokes. all pizzas with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's correct, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $56.55 is the total. did you want me to place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. i've submitted the order. it'll be ready for pick up in 35 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That would be all. Thank you so much for your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you are very welcome.

items.name: goat cheese, feta cheese, artichokes and bacon
extra mushrooms, cheddar cheese, extra bacon, and bbq sauce
